sentence.Network_en: Eisenhower was intensely aware of the need for long-range planning.

sentence.Network_cn: 远期目标必须是将核武器尽数销毁。

entry.tran: （军事装备或运载工具）远程的
entry.def: A long-range piece of military equipment or vehicle is able to hit or detect a target a long way away or to travel a long way in order to do something.

example.ex: He is very keen to reach agreement with the US on reducing long-range nuclear missiles.
example.tran: 他很想和美国达成协议，减少远程核导弹的数量。

example.ex: ...the growing use on the North Atlantic routes of long-range twin-engined aircraft.
example.tran: 远程双引擎飞机在北大西洋航线上越来越多的使用

entry.def: A long-range plan or prediction relates to a period extending a long time into the future.

example.ex: Eisenhower was intensely aware of the need for long-range planning.
example.tran: 艾森豪威尔深谙长远规划的必要性。

example.ex: ...a bold, complex, and long-range strategy for improving US education.
example.tran: 一项大胆、复杂的改善美国教育水平的长远策略

means.word_mean: 1. involving an extended span of time;
2. suitable for or reaching long distances;
